app-example: The control unit is installed aft of the flight compartment.
not-app-example: The control unit is installed abaft the flight compartment

app-example: When the wind speed decreases to less than 30 knots, you can open the cargo door.
not-app-example: When the wind speed abates to less than 30 knots, you can open the cargo door.

app-example: Accept the relay if it is servicable.
Get access to the accumulator for the No. 1 hydraulic system.
Turn the cover until you can get access to the jacks.
not-app-example: Rotate the cover until the jacks marked by + and - are accessible.

app-example: Different lengths of studs let youattach different thicknesses of skin.
not-app-example: Studs are available in different lengths to accommodate different thicknesses of skin.

app-example: Examine the shackle at the end of the sling.
In this procedure, use standard tools.
